item.description: OPINION: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes predicts the end of QT on April 1, suggests markets should watch for an SLR exemption or QE restart, sees $77K as Bitcoin’s bottom, but warns of potential stock market declines.
JUST IN: Bakkt appoints former SoftBank executive Akshay Naheta as co-CEO and plans to streamline services to focus on crypto after losing two major clients.

OPINION: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood says most memecoins will become worthless due to their reliance on celebrity hype and lack of real-world use cases, stating that Ark Invest has no plans to invest in them.

RECENTLY: Three executives linked to Trump Media & Technology Group are launching a $179 million SPAC, Renatus Tactical Acquisition Corp I, which may acquire a U.S.-based crypto, blockchain, or data security firm, according to report.
OPINION: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes suggests Bitcoin is unlikely to drop to $77,000 again, citing the Federal Reserve’s plan to slow quantitative tightening.
RECENTLY: The number of Dogecoin wallets holding at least 1 million DOGE has increased, suggesting accumulation by large holders amid a broader market retrace, per report.
RECENTLY: According to a report, Spanish Police dismantled a criminal gang behind a fraudulent cryptocurrency pyramid scheme that defrauded over 3600 victims of more than $32 million.
ANALYSIS: Bitcoin surged 4% to $85,900 amid strong institutional demand, $500 million in ETF inflows, and increased whale accumulation ahead of the Federal Reserve’s rate pause decision.
OPINION: Wiley Nickel emphasizes that lasting crypto regulations must be passed through Congress rather than executive orders.
JUST IN: Aerodrome’s founder denies Coinbase betrayed them, saying they chose not to prioritize Verified Pools.
JUST IN: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has stated that the company might reduce XRP sales at some point.
JUST IN: Volatility Shares debuts Solana futures ETFs, igniting hopes for spot approval and fueling institutional buzz around the $67B blockchain.
JUST IN: Crypto trading soars 29% in Turkey as Lira crashes to record low after rival leader’s arrest sparks turmoil.
JUST IN: Binance launches a community-driven token listing event, empowering users to vote on new tokens, enhancing engagement, and potentially boosting token values.
TODAY: Tether has minted another $1B USDT on TRON DAO network, they have minted about $6B USDT so far in 2025.
JUST IN: The Turkish lira has hit a record low of 40.96 against the U.S. dollar before recovering to 38.74 after the unexpected arrest of Istanbul Mayor Ekrem Imamoglu.
JUST IN: TRON Founder Justin Sun has staked $100 million in ETH, generating an estimated $3 million in annual passive income, per report.
JUST IN: LMAX Digital has enabled access to Ripple USD (RLUSD) stablecoin for its clients.
JUST IN: SEC has officially drops it’s Ripple XRP appeal, according to reports.
OPINION: President Trump's Executive Director, Bo Hines, says, "We discussed methods of acquiring more Bitcoin in budget-neutral ways. We want as much as we can get."
JUST IN: ETH breaks above $2,000.
JUST IN: Crypto market maker Keyrock has launched in the US, citing increased regulatory clarity under Trump’s administration.
JUST IN: The SEC Crypto Task Force’s first roundtable session on crypto asset regulation will take place on March 21 and be streamed live to the public.
OPINION: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan says Bitcoin follows a "Dip and Rip" pattern—initially dropping more than stocks but rebounding strongly the next year.

JUST IN: Arizona’s crypto legal tender bill (SB1062) has passed the House Commerce Committee, proposing to recognize Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as legal tender for public charges in the state.
